title: A Fire called Jeremiah
creator_credit: James Algar and Walt Disney Productions
brief_description: Shows modern technical methods of fire-fighting used by the United States Forest Service to prevent forest fires from approaching gigantic proportions and destroying hundreds of human lives.
description: Shows modern technical methods of fire-fighting used by the United States Forest Service to prevent forest fires from approaching gigantic proportions and destroying hundreds of human lives.
